item.title: 参议院删除税收法案中限制州人工智能监管的条款
item.description: 参议院否决了一项有争议的阻止美国各州监管人工智能的努力，在一项妥协方案失败后，最大科技公司的批评者赢得了胜利。【原文：The Senate killed a controversial effort to prevent US states from regulating artificial intelligence, delivering a win for critics of the biggest tech companies after a compromise proposal collapsed.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织支持瑞士银行在瑞银资本僵局中推进银行改革
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，瑞士计划进行的金融监管改革是 "大胆的"，应能提高该国抵御危机的能力，并对瑞士政府与瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在资本问题上的对峙给予了默许。【原文：Switzerland’s planned financial regulation reforms are “bold” and should make the country more resistant to crises, the International Monetary Fund said, giving tacit support to the government in its standoff over capital with UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 阿波罗医院分拆医疗技术部门，股价跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 印度最大的医疗服务公司阿波罗医院企业有限公司（Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd.）周二宣布计划合并其数字医疗和药房业务，并将其分拆为一个新的上市实体，随后该公司股价大涨，创下历史新高。【原文：Shares of Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd., India’s largest healthcare services firm, surged to a record Tuesday after it announced plans to merge its digital health and pharmacy businesses and spin them off as a new listed entity.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称五月消费者通胀预期下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行表示，5 月份欧元区消费者的通胀预期有所缓解。【原文：Inflation expectations of euro-area consumers eased in May, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称进一步利率调整幅度不会太大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，只要经济发展符合最新预测，欧洲中央银行最多也只会对借贷成本做出微调。【原文：The European Central Bank will make minor changes to borrowing costs at best as long as the economy develops in line with the most recent projections, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 瑞士制造业因有望与美国达成关税协议而跃升
item.description: 瑞士制造业在 6 月份的增长远超预期，这反映出随着 7 月 9 日最后期限的临近，与美国之间的关税争端有望得到解决。【原文：Swiss manufacturing rose much more than anticipated in June, reflecting hope that a solution to the ongoing tariff spat with the US can be found as the July 9 deadline looms.】

item.title: 埃斯克里瓦称对称的 2% 目标仍应是欧洲央行的主要指导方针
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）认为，欧洲中央银行关注 2% 的对称通胀目标是正确的。【原文：The European Central Bank is right to focus on a symmetric 2% inflation target, according to Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称欧元升值超过 1.20 美元将很复杂
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧元升值超过 1.20 美元可能会让决策者感到棘手，但目前的水平并不令人担忧。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said an advance in the euro beyond $1.20 could prove tricky for policymakers but current levels aren’t cause for concern.】

item.title: 资本集团的吉特林说，投资者正在分散投资，远离美国
item.description: Capital Group 首席执行官迈克-吉特林（Mike Gitlin）表示，鉴于其他地方存在引人注目的机遇，以及地缘政治和供应链中断带来的风险，投资者正着眼于从美国进行多元化投资。【原文：Capital Group CEO Mike Gitlin said investors are eyeing diversification away from the US given the compelling opportunities elsewhere, and the risks stemming from geopolitics and supply-chain disruptions.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔认为通胀已进入 "平静期"，但仍需谨慎行事
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行已经控制住了通货膨胀，但绝不能因为地缘政治背景的剧烈动荡而沾沾自喜。【原文：The European Central Bank has brought inflation under control but mustn’t become complacent due to the highly volatile geopolitical backdrop, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 欧洲银行上半年股价涨幅创本世纪之最
item.description: 欧洲银行股刚刚完成了自 1997 年以来最强劲的上半年表现，从而延续了该行业的黄金时期。【原文：European bank stocks just completed their strongest first-half since 1997, and in doing so extended what has been a golden run for the sector.】

item.title: Aviva 37 亿英镑的 Direct Line 交易获得英国监管机构批准
item.description: Aviva Plc 以大约 37 亿英镑（50.9 亿美元）收购 Direct Line Insurance Group Plc 以打造英国最大汽车保险公司的计划已获得英国竞争监管机构的批准。【原文：Aviva Plc’s plan to buy Direct Line Insurance Group Plc for roughly £3.7 billion ($5.09 billion) to create the UK’s largest motor insurer has been given the nod from the country’s competition regulator.】

item.title: 在英国食品价格顽固上涨的情况下，塞恩斯伯里销售额上升
item.description: J Sainsbury Plc 的销售额增幅超过预期，在英国各地食品通胀加速的情况下，该公司称这是一个积极的开年。【原文：J Sainsbury Plc’s sales rose more than expected in what it called a positive start to the year, as food inflation accelerates across the UK.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称，英国房价出现 2023 年以来最大幅度下跌
item.description: 据英国一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，6月份英国房价创下两年多来最大跌幅，这表明在4月份交易税上调后，购房者面临压力。【原文：UK house prices fell the most in more than two years in June in a sign buyers are under pressure after an increase in transaction taxes in April, according to one of Britain’s top mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 芯片设计公司 SkyeChip 首席执行官称其接近在马来西亚上市
item.description: 马来西亚半导体设计公司SkyeChip Sdn.首席执行官Fong Swee Kiang表示，在连续几年实现收入和利润增长后，公司 "接近 "首次公开募股。【原文：Malaysian semiconductor designer SkyeChip Sdn. is “close” to an initial public offering after posting consecutive years of revenue and profit growth, said Chief Executive Officer Fong Swee Kiang.】

item.title: 南非卡冈亚戈认为通胀目标制定工作即将完成
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-卡尼亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，国家财政部和央行对南非通胀目标的审查即将完成。【原文：A review of South Africa’s inflation target by the National Treasury and the nation’s central bank is close to completion, Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.】

item.title: 沃伯格即将斥资 8 亿欧元收购滑雪头盔制造商 Uvex
item.description: 知情人士透露，华平投资集团（Warburg Pincus）即将收购德国滑雪头盔和护目镜制造商 Uvex 集团的多数股权。【原文：Warburg Pincus is close to acquiring a majority stake in Uvex Group, the German maker of ski helmets and goggles, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在 2009 年以来最好的上半年后走强
阿布扎比公用事业公司 Tabreed 收购 PAL 后考虑更多交易
item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的公用事业公司国家中央冷却公司（National Central Cooling Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi-based utility National Central Cooling Co. sees scope for further acquisitions after announcing a $1 billion deal to buy another air-conditioning provider in the United Arab Emirates capital.】

item.title: 澳门博彩收入因演唱会热潮飙升超过预期
item.description: 澳门 6 月份的月博彩收入增长了 19%，超过了分析师的预期，因为游客涌入这个全球最大的赌博中心，观看粤语流行音乐会和其他娱乐活动。【原文：Macau’s monthly gaming revenue rose 19% in June, exceeding analyst expectations as visitors poured in to the world’s biggest gambling hub for Cantonese pop concerts and other entertainment offerings.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯警告欧元和能源导致通胀路径脆弱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，欧洲中央银行已经实现了通胀目标，但外汇和大宗商品市场的波动意味着物价前景暗淡。【原文：The European Central Bank has fulfilled its inflation goal but volatility in foreign-exchange and commodities markets means the outlook for prices is murky, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 历经六年首席执行官风波，Absa 新任总裁谋划扭亏为盈
item.description: Absa Group Ltd. 的新掌门人旨在将该银行的零售部门打造成南非最大的银行，重整其地区业务，并为这家多年来经历了六位高管的公司带来稳定。【原文：Absa Group Ltd.’s new head is aiming to turn the bank’s retail unit into the biggest in South Africa, revamp its regional operations and bring stability to a firm that has seen six top managers in as many years.】

item.title: 沙特阿卡瓦公司股东批准 19 亿美元供股
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Acwa 电力公司在获得股东批准后，将继续进行耗资 71 亿里亚尔（19 亿美元）的供股，这标志着该公司为积极拓展可再生能源和清洁能源项目提供资金的计划迈出了关键一步。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Acwa Power Co. will proceed with its 7.1 billion riyals ($1.9 billion) rights issue after gaining the approval of its shareholders, marking a key step in its plan to fund an aggressive expansion in renewable and clean energy projects.】

item.title: 中国提高外商投资配额，结束 13 个月的停滞期
item.description: 随着中国放松对资本外流的控制，自去年 5 月以来，中国首次提高了获准投资者投入海外资产的资金额度。【原文：China has increased the amount of money that approved investors can put into overseas assets for the first time since May last year as its relaxes its control over capital outflows.】

item.title: SAP 在与 Celonis 的美国法律诉讼中初战告捷
item.description: 欧洲最有价值的初创企业之一在美国提起诉讼，指控这家德国技术巨头非法利用其市场力量，SAP SE 在诉讼中提前胜诉。【原文：SAP SE won an early round in a lawsuit filed in the US by one of Europe’s most valuable startups accusing the German technology giant of illegally wielding its market power.】

item.description:

item.description:

item.description:
尽管地缘政治混乱，股票和债券市场仍保持轻松。【原文：

The stock and bond markets remain relaxed despite geopolitical chaos.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行再添 "温和鹰派"，荷兰央行老将离职
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）最新的利率制定者奥拉夫-斯莱鹏（Olaf Sleijpen）即将继续他荷兰前任的工作。【原文：Olaf Sleijpen, the European Central Bank’s newest interest-rate setter, is about to continue where his Dutch predecessor left off.】

item.title: 萨普拉能源公司称重组已进入 "最后阶段
item.description: 马来西亚油气承包商 Sapura Energy Bhd 公司第一季度财报显示，该公司恢复财务稳定的重组计划已进入 "最后阶段"。【原文：Malaysian oil and gas contractor Sapura Energy Bhd.’s restructuring plan to restore financial stability is entering its “final stages,” according to the company’s first-quarter earnings statement.】
